param.name: input
param.label: Prey File or single column list

help.p:
This program will read in a SAINT formatted Prey file or a single column list (no column name) of Uniprot accessions (e.g. "P00533" or "EGFR_HUMAN"), query the CRAPome database (v1.1), and return a file specifying the prevalence of each protein in the CRAPome.
1) Input File
SAINT formatted Prey file or a single column list (no column name) of Uniprot accessions
2) Species
Please specify species. Supported species are Human and Yeast
